title: Erdogan says Turkey will continue oil, natural gas trade with Iran: NTV
text:
Erdogan says Turkey will continue oil, natural gas trade with Iran: NTV

Stock Markets 52 minutes ago (Sep 26, 2019 07:01PM ET)

ANKARA (Reuters) - Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan said on Friday it was impossible for Turkey to stop buying oil and from Iran, despite the threat of U.S. sanctions, and added that trade between the two countries would continue, according to broadcaster NTV. Speaking to reporters on his return flight from the United Nations General Assembly in New York, Erdogan said Turkey was not afraid of possible U.S. sanctions over its trade with Iran, adding that Ankara did not want to sever its cooperation with Tehran.

Erdogan says Turkey will continue oil, natural gas trade with Iran: NTV
description: Erdogan says Turkey will continue oil, natural gas trade with Iran: NTV
